price: 30. Tozalaki na bokoki epai na bino te, bino moko nde bozalaki bato ya mabe.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيۡكُم مِّن سُلۡطَٰنِۭۖ بَلۡ كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا طَٰغِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna lanā ʿalaykum min sul'ṭānin bal kuntum qawman ṭāghīna
